actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act.
short_title: Fee Repeal and Expanded Access Act of 2009
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Fee Repeal and Expanded Access Act of 2009 - Revises specified provisions of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act, including provisions concerning recreation fee authority, use of funds, distribution of revenue, recreation passes, and cooperative agreements. Provides for the application and administration of certain admission and use fee authorities under the Land and Water Conservation Act of 1965, the Emergency Wetlands Resources Act of 1986, and the National Parks Omnibus Management Act of 1998 as if the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act had not been enacted.

titles.title: Fee Repeal and Expanded Access Act of 2009
A bill to repeal certain provisions of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act.
